input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
White Mountain Puzzles Nesting Loons - 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle

Product features:
Made in the United States
100% recycled materials
1000 piece puzzle
Artist Lee Stoncek
Jigsaw puzzle
input_text.Response A: This jigsaw puzzle is a great way to spend a lazy afternoon! The puzzle features a beautiful illustration of three nesting loons on a calm lake. The puzzle is made in the United States from 100% recycled materials and contains 1000 pieces. The puzzle measures 24" x 30" when completed. This puzzle is perfect for adults and children alike!
input_text.Response B: The White Mountain Puzzles Nesting Loons - 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle is a fun and challenging puzzle that will keep you entertained for hours. The puzzle features stunning artwork by Lee Stoncek that captures the beauty of these majestic birds. The puzzle is made from 100% recycled materials and is made in the USA. With 1000 pieces, this puzzle is great for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages and skill levels. Whether you're working on it alone or with a group, this puzzle is sure to provide hours of entertainment and delight.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.factors_a: The response added in some details which were incorrect based on the prompt
